mapper.select: select * from l_community_household lch left join l_community_layer lcl on lch.LAYER_ID = lcl.ID left join l_community_unit lcu on lcl.UNIT_ID = lcu.ID left join l_community_building lcb on lcu.BUILDING_ID = lcb.ID left join l_community_period lcp on lcb.PERIOD_ID = lcp.ID where lch.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lch.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcl.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lcl.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcb.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lcb.IS_DELETE = 0 and lcp.IS_ENABLE = 1 and lcp.IS_DELETE = 0 and lch.ID = #{householdId}
